inclusion.criterion: HER2-positive Stage I histologically confirmed invasive carcinoma of the breast
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Bilateral breast cancers that individually meet eligibility criteria are allowed
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Use of potent CYP3A4 inhibitors during the study treatment period
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has gallstones and biliary sludge, but no history of previous invasive breast cancer or prior chemotherapy in the past 5 years.
